text.div:
Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    21363-7 Legionella pneumophila DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49616-6 Legionella sp DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    5020-3 Legionella sp rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    67563-7 Legionella micdadei DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    81690-0 Legionella longbeachae 1 and 2 DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    88577-2 Legionella pneumophila DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    88587-1 Legionella sp DNA [Identifier] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    88588-9 Legionella sp DNA [Identifier] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    88590-5 Legionella pneumophila DNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92145-2 Legionella pneumophila DNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92969-5 Legionella pneumophila DNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with non-probe detection
